      • lengthen

        public FullMessage<PayloadT> lengthen(java.lang.String from)
        Returns a FullMessage object with the same information as the current message with "from" field given by the user.
        Parameters:
        from - a String representation of the source address of the message.
        Returns:
        a full message with the given source address.
        See Also:
        FullMessage

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(java.util.function.Function<PayloadT,java.lang.String> formatting)
        Prints message to a String, with a custom formatting for the payload. If the payload is to be printed with its own toString method, just use the default no-parameters toString method of this class.
        Parameters:
        formatting - a function to convert the payload to a meaningful String.
        Returns:
        a String representation of the message.
